title:
Dimension formula for the twisted Jacquet module of a cuspidal
  representation of $\GL(2n,\mathbb{F}_q)$
abstract:
Let $F$ be a finite field and $G=\GL(2n,F)$. In this paper, we calculate the
dimension of the twisted Jacquet module $\pi_{N,\psi_{A}}$ where $A\in \M(n,F)$
is a rank $k$ matrix and $\pi$ is an irreducible cuspidal representation of
$G$.
